artefactsOfPower.name: Leering Gitshield
artefactsOfPower.lore: The spiteful enchantments woven into this hideous shield ensure terrible misfortune falls on any who dare attack its bearer.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Each time an unmodified hit roll for an **attack** that targets this unit is 1, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the ****ATTACK**** ability has been resolved.

artefactsOfPower.name: The Clammy Cowl
artefactsOfPower.lore: This enchanted hood wreathes its wearer in damp gloom, causing enemies to swing wildly at their blurred outline and weapons to slip in suddenly moistened palms.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target this unit.

artefactsOfPower.name: Backstabber's Blade
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, End of Any Turn
artefactsOfPower.lore: A slitta made from pure shadow and malice, this blade always finds its victim’s weak spots.
artefactsOfPower.declare: Pick an enemy ****HERO**** in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

heroicTraits.name: Fight Another Day
heroicTraits.lore: This warlord has mastered the ignoble art of striking then running away before the enemy can hit back.
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit is in combat, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can immediately use the ‘**Retreat**’ ability as if it were your movement phase without any mortal damage being inflicted on it.

heroicTraits.name: Loontouched
heroicTraits.lore: This warlord’s magical prowess is boosted by the Bad Moon’s light.
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit is not a ****WIZARD****, it has ****WIZARD** (1)**. Otherwise, add 1 to casting rolls for this unit.

heroicTraits.name: The Clammy Hand
heroicTraits.lore: This boss is obviously destined for great things and can call upon vast troglodytic hordes.
heroicTraits.effect: Each time a friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ** unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6.

battleTraits.name: Under the Light of the Bad Moon
battleTraits.lore: Grots are always vicious little monsters, but when their god’s light falls upon them, they become an order of magnitude more dangerous.
battleTraits.effect:
During the battle, an area of the battlefield will be the Bad Moon’s location (see ‘The Bad Moon’s Orbit’). The Bad Moon’s location will be either a quarter of the battlefield or the centre of the battlefield.

While the Bad Moon’s location is a quarter of the battlefield, all **GLOOMSPITE GITZ** units (friendly and enemy) wholly within that quarter are **under the light of the Bad Moon**. While the Bad Moon’s location is the centre of the battlefield, all **GLOOMSPITE GITZ** units (friendly and enemy) on the battlefield are **under the light of the Bad Moon**.

While a friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ** unit is **under the light of** **the Bad Moon**, the appropriate effect below applies to it:

***Frothing Zealots:*** If the unit is a non‑****SQUIG** **MOONCLAN**** unit, add 3 to its control score.

***Lunar Squigs:*** If the unit is a ****SQUIG**** unit, you can re-roll the random characteristic roll for its **Move** characteristic.

***Moonlit Hide:*** If the unit is a ****TROGGOTH**** unit, add 1 to save rolls for it.

*****Spiderfang** Venom:*** If the unit is a ****SPIDERFANG**** unit, its combat attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+. This ability also affects **Companion** weapons.

battleTraits.name: The Bad Moon's Orbit
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round (Army), Start of Battle Round
battleTraits.lore: The Bad Moon hurtles around the realms in madcap orbits, empowering its worshippers and troubling all others with insane visions.
battleTraits.declare:
You must use this ability at the start of the battle round. 

If multiple players are commanding a Gloomspite Gitz army, then instead, at the start of the battle round, those players roll off and only the winner declares and uses this ability this battle round.
battleTraits.effect:
If it is the first battle round, pick a quarter of the battlefield to be the Bad Moon’s starting location.

If it is the second or subsequent battle round, roll a dice. On a 1-3, the Bad Moon stays at its current location. On a 4+, the Bad Moon moves.

The first time the Bad Moon moves, it moves to the centre of the battlefield. The second time it moves, it moves to the quarter diagonally opposite the quarter in which it started. The third time it moves, it moves off the battlefield and has no further effect on the battle.

battleTraits.name: Under the Light of the Bad Moon
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Start of the First Battle Round
battleTraits.lore: Grots are always vicious little monsters, but when their god’s light falls upon them, they become an order of magnitude more dangerous.
battleTraits.declare:
Pick a territory (either friendly territory or enemy territory) to be **under the Light of the Bad Moon**. If both players can use this ability, the players roll off and the winner picks a territory to be under the Light of the Bad Moon.

The territory picked remains under the Light of the Bad Moon in the first and second battle rounds. In the third and fourth battle rounds, the other territory is under the Light of the Bad Moon.
battleTraits.effect:
While a friendly unit is wholly within the territory that is **under the Light of the Bad Moon**, the appropriate effect below applies to it:

***Frothing Zealots:*** If the unit is a ****Moonclan** Stabbas** unit, add 3 to its control score.

***Lunar Squigs:*** If the unit is a ****Squig** Hoppers** unit, no mortal damage is inflicted on it when it uses ****Retreat**** abilities.

***Moonlit Hide:*** If the unit is a **Rockgut Troggoths** unit, add 1 to save rolls for it.

battleTraits.name: Squigalanche
battleTraits.lore: A curious, arrhythmic pounding and cackles of wicked glee in the distance signal the approach of a mob of manic Squig Hoppers!
battleTraits.effect: Set up this unit wholly within your territory, wholly within 3" of a battlefield edge and more than 6" from all enemy units.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Hallucinogenic Fungus Brew
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Stolen from the shamans of the Gobbapalooza, this potent brew makes the imbiber almost impervious to pain. However, as the battle progresses, the effects start to wear off.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Your general has **WARD (4+)** in the first battle round, **WARD (5+)** in the second battle round, and **WARD (6+)** in the third and fourth battle rounds.

spearheadEnhancements.name: The Clammy Cowl
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This enchanted hood wreathes its wearer in damp gloom, causing enemies to swing wildly at their blurred outline and weapons to slip in suddenly moistened palms.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target your general.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Fight Another Day
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Your general has mastered the ignoble art of striking then running away before the enemy can hit back.
spearheadEnhancements.declare: Pick your general to use this ability if they used a ****FIGHT**** ability this turn.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Your general can make a 2D6" **move** but cannot end that **move** in combat.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Nightshade Mushroom
spearheadEnhancements.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Enemy Movement Phase
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This black-capped fungus bursts into a cloud of pitch darkness when tossed into the air.
spearheadEnhancements.declare: Pick a friendly unit within your general’s combat range.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: That unit cannot be targeted by shooting attacks in the next shooting phase.

regimentAbilities.name: The Hand of Gork
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, (Army) Your Movement Phase
regimentAbilities.lore: A bizarre ritual worked before the battle calls down a ghostly green hand that can carry a mob to where they are most needed.
regimentAbilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit that is not in combat to use this ability.
regimentAbilities.effect: Remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up again more than 9" from all enemy units.

regimentAbilities.name: The Lunatic Hordes
regimentAbilities.lore: From out of caves and darkened lairs, a stream of ravening grots pours forth into the lurid light of the Bad Moon.
regimentAbilities.declare: Pick a friendly ****Moonclan** Stabbas** unit to use this ability.
regimentAbilities.effect: You can return up to D3 slain models to that unit.

regimentOfRenown.name: Go Dat Way!
regimentOfRenown.lore: Snerk makes sure to give his troggoth mate a jab if they get distracted. Which they do. Often.
regimentOfRenown.declare: Pick the **Dankhold **Troggoth**** in this Regiment of Renown to be the target if it is within 12" of the **Loonboss** in this Regiment of Renown.
regimentOfRenown.effect: For the rest of the turn, the target can still use ****CHARGE**** abilities even if it used a ****RETREAT**** ability in the same turn.

regimentOfRenown.name: Taktikal Cowering
regimentOfRenown.lore: Snerk can usually be found hurling insults from behind his mate’s solid, regenerating body.
regimentOfRenown.effect:
While the **Loonboss** in this Regiment of Renown is within the combat range of the **Dankhold **Troggoth**** in this Regiment of Renown:

• That **Loonboss** has **WARD** (4+).
• Each time you make a successful ward roll for that **Loonboss**, allocate 1 damage point to that **Dankhold **Troggoth**** after the damage sequence for that **Loonboss** has been resolved (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: Spore Maws
abilities.lore: The caster causes the thick spores around them to coalesce into gnashing green mouths.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick up to 3 visible enemy units within 12" of them to be the targets, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: The Hand of Gork
abilities.lore: A ghostly hand picks up a mob of gitz and plonks them back down where they are most needed.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly unit wholly within 12" of them and not in combat to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield wholly within 24" of the caster and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Sneaky Distraction
abilities.lore: The shaman’s unnaturally shrill cries and magical light‑show hypnotically draw the attention of their foes.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by enemy units while they are wholly within 12" of the caster.

abilities.name: Summon Mork's Mighty Mushroom
abilities.lore: The shaman takes a small mushroom and hurls it with all his might. When it lands, it sprouts impossibly quickly into a gigantic skullshroom, a fungus said to grow between Mork’s own toes.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Mork’s Mighty Mushroom** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Mork’s Mighty Mushroom** wholly within 12" of the caster and visible to them.

abilities.name: Summon Scrapskuttle’s Arachnacauldron
abilities.lore: The shaman whistles loudly, calling the squealing, bubbling Scrapskuttle’s Arachnacauldron to their side.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Scrapskuttle’s Arachnacauldron** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Scrapskuttle’s Arachnacauldron** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Summon Scuttletide
abilities.lore: The shaman grasps a small jade amulet in which a skullback spider is imprisoned and uses it to call forth a seething mass of the trapped creature’s kin.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Scuttletide** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Scuttletide** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Summon Malevolent Moon
abilities.lore: The shaman transforms a loonstone statue into a huge glowing terror and lets it loose on the battlefield.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Malevolent Moon** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Malevolent Moon** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Herd Healing
abilities.lore: When troggoths gather in larger numbers, the sheer troggness of the herd serves as a catalyst for their regenerative abilities.
abilities.effect: Each time a friendly **TROGGOTH** unit uses a **FIGHT** ability, after that ability has been resolved, **Heal (D3)** that unit.

abilities.name: Spreading Loonacy
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Your Turn
abilities.lore: When Moonclan grots gather, the energies of the Gloomspite surge through them like a tide, sending them frothing mad.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly non‑**SQUIG MOONCLAN** units in combat to be the targets.
abilities.effect:
For each target:

• Make a pile-in move with the target.
• Then, pick an enemy unit in combat with the target and roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Bouncing Fury
abilities.lore: A veritable tide of vicious, impossibly hungry, fangtoothed monsters boing into enemy lines, biting, chewing and swallowing their victims whole.
abilities.effect: Each time a friendly **SQUIG** unit charges, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of its **Fang-filled Gobs**, **Massive Fang-filled** **Gobs** or **Huge Fang-filled Gobs** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Realmweb Ambush
abilities.lore: Scuttling into battle on magical, realm-spanning webs, there is no way to predict where a Spiderfang Stalktribe will launch their next ambush.
abilities.effect:
Each time a friendly **Skitterstrand Arachnarok** uses the ‘Realmweb Lurker’ ability, you can pick another friendly **SPIDERFANG** unit to also use that ability.

In addition, each time a friendly **Skitterstrand Arachnarok** uses the ‘Ambush from Beyond’ ability, you can pick another friendly **SPIDERFANG** unit that is **skittering through tunnels in reality** to also use that ability. That unit must be set up wholly within 12" of the **Skitterstrand Arachnarok** using the ability.
